title: ‘Cold hearted’ Stamos on Abdul
text: ‘Cold hearted’ Stamos on Abdul 4:17 AM Network Writers JOHN Stamos has dished on his former relationship with Paula Abdul, including comments that she wrote her hit Cold Hearted about him. How Cindy ended up in George’s bed 1:05 AM Network Writers GEORGE Clooney has shared details of how he ended up in bed with his best mate’s wife, none other than supermodel Cindy Crawford. Smaller Taste on the cards 0:00 AM JESSICA HOWARD STALLHOLDER applications for this year’s Taste of Tasmania are down 38 per cent on last year. Mel deeply hurt by nurse tweet 23:48 PM ANNA VLACH MEL Greig is deeply disappointed a fellow Celebrity Apprentice cast mate retweeted a comment that branded her a “murderer”. Mel deeply hurt by cast mate’s retweet 23:15 PM ANNA VLACH FORMER radio presenter Mel Greig says she is deeply disappointed that a fellow Celebrity Apprentice contestant retweeted a comment that branded her a “murderer”. Julie Bishop is Alien’s only hope 22:00 PM Neala Johnson National Film Writer DIRECTOR Ridley Scott will be in Australia “in a heartbeat” to film a new movie if Foreign Affairs Minister Julie Bishop approves him “nowish”. Ten TV shows that will not die 22:00 PM Andrew Fenton Entertainment Writer SHOWS with loyal followings that were once destined for the TV graveyard are being picked up by Foxtel and streaming sites to boost subscriber numbers. The massive film coming to Australia 19:09 PM Maria Lewis THE MARTIAN director Ridley Scott is the man of the moment. And he’s just confirmed he’ll be filming his next big movie in Australia in January.
